results.title: Potentiation of thermoregulatory responses to isoproterenol by beta-adrenergic antagonists.
results.text_hl: The potentiation was more marked with the @GENE_UGT1A2 @GENE_396527 @@@beta 2@@@-selective antagonist @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118,551@@@, whereas treatment with the @GENE_UGT1A1 @GENE_24861 @@@beta 1@@@-selective antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ resulted in a profound @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@Iso@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Agnosia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000377 @@@reduction in temperature@@@.

citations.NLM: Carlisle HJ, Stock MJ. Potentiation of thermoregulatory responses to isoproterenol by beta-adrenergic antagonists. Am J Physiol. 1992 Oct;263(4 Pt 2):R915-23. PMID: 1357990
